title: Can Riot please bring back the Grading feature?
body:
Can Riot please re-introduce this feature at the end of game screen?

It clearly shows your grade out of all grades, the XP you earned and the progress you have made before earning the next level. 

Oh and it looks and sounds cool and will suit new client.

Thanks! =]

replies.body: This feature is still there. You just need to hover over the champions image (to the right) in the match results screen to see it.

Indeed, part of it is, but it requires you to do that and even so it does not show you clearly your progress to next level. It does show you the grade you are out of all the other grades, and it's no where near as cool. xD
Maybe, to make the 'abomination' better, perhaps? Come on, Talon, I thought you would have realised that by now.
Why put a good feature in when they can continue with the abomination they have already?
